Package Terminal

Class Terminal

java.lang.Object
Terminal.Terminal
public class Terminal extends Object
 This class Terminal will handle the commands
 and what each command will do
Version:
1.2
Author:
Malik Khaled
     Mohamed Amir

    • cd

      public void cd(String[] args)
       This method cd will change the path to new one
      Parameters:
      args -

      -case 1: no arguments and changes the current path to the path of your home directory.

      -case 2: 1 argument which is “..” (e.g. cd ..) and changes the current directory to the previous directory.

      -case 3: 1 argument which is either the full path or the relative (short) path and changes the current path to that path. *

    • redirect

      public void redirect(String content, String file, boolean ifShouldExist) throws IOException
       This method redirect it contains two cases
  1- if ifShouldExist = true so it must be the file created
      if not the method will show error to user
  2- if ifShouldExist = false so it must not be the file created
      if not the method will create one
      Parameters:
      content - represent the content which put in the file
      file - represent the file which will put into the content
      ifShouldExist - represent the case of file
      Throws:
      IOException - if failed or interrupted I/O operations.
